Package view

Class UusiGuiKontolleri

java.lang.Object
view.UusiGuiKontolleri
public class UusiGuiKontolleri extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling the GUI of the application. It interacts with the Kontrolleri, SimuDao, and Visualisointi classes to control and display data.

  • Constructor Details

    • UusiGuiKontolleri

      public UusiGuiKontolleri()
      Constructor for the UusiGuiKontolleri class. Initializes the Kontrolleri and SimuDao objects, and sets up a RotateTransition.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the GUI controller. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded.

    • kaynnistaSimulointi

      public void kaynnistaSimulointi()
      Starts the simulation. Enables the speed slider and the add and remove service buttons. Disables the simulate button. Displays the service points in the second visualization and starts the dollar image rotation.

    • handleTyhjenna

      public void handleTyhjenna()
      Clears the visualizations and the input fields. Resets the speed slider and the clock time. Disables the speed slider and the add and remove service buttons. Enables the simulate button. Initializes the controller data.

    • naytaData

      public void naytaData()
      Displays the data of a specified number of simulations. The number is taken from the kuinkaMontaField text field. If the number is greater than the maximum ID in the database, an alert is shown.

    • showInfo

      public void showInfo()
      Shows an information alert with instructions on how to use the simulation data display feature.

    • showAlert

      public void showAlert(int maxId)
      Shows an error alert when the user tries to display more simulation data than is available in the database.
      Parameters:
      maxId - The maximum number of simulations that can be displayed.

    • inputError

      public void inputError()
      Shows an error alert when the user enters an invalid input in the kuinkaMontaField text field.

    • getAika

      public String getAika()
      Returns the text in the aikaField text field.
      Returns:
      The text in the aikaField text field.

    • getViive

      public String getViive()
      Returns the text in the viiveField text field.
      Returns:
      The text in the viiveField text field.

    • getVaratutAsiakkaat

      public String getVaratutAsiakkaat()
      Returns the text in the varatutField text field.
      Returns:
      The text in the varatutField text field.

    • getVisualisointi

      public IVisualisointi getVisualisointi()
      Returns the first visualization object.
      Returns:
      The first visualization object.

    • getVisualisointi2

      public IVisualisointi getVisualisointi2()
      Returns the second visualization object.
      Returns:
      The second visualization object.

    • setUusiGui

      public void setUusiGui(UusiGui uusiGui)
      Sets the UusiGui object. This method is currently empty and does not perform any actions.
      Parameters:
      uusiGui - The UusiGui object to set.

    • nopeusLiuku

      public void nopeusLiuku()
      Adjusts the simulation speed according to the value of the speed slider.

    • lisaaPalvelu

      public void lisaaPalvelu()
      Adds a service according to the value selected in the add service combo box.

    • poistaPalvelu

      public void poistaPalvelu()
      Removes a service according to the value selected in the remove service combo box.

    • getKontrolleri

      public UusiGuiKontolleri getKontrolleri()
      Returns this GUI controller.
      Returns:
      This GUI controller.

    • stopRotate

      public void stopRotate()
      Stops the rotation of the dollar image and resets its rotation angle to 0.
